website_summaries.verdict: Directly in tune with your baby's movements via his or her breathing.
pros: Multiple settings staged to sound an alarm in the event no movement is detected for 15 seconds
Simple design does not require a smartphone
Makes a great baby shower gift
cons: May be difficult to fit on newborns

customer_reviews.title: Buy owlet instead
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after the death of my son. I had a hard time trusting that his twin sister was ok. After approximately 1 month the battery seemed to die on my Snuza. I replaced it but the unit still didn’t work. I contacted the company and they did not stand by their product. I should have written this 3 years ago when it happened but I was too distraught. We got a hospital pulse ox instead. With this baby we bought an owlet instead and have had no issues with it. I would stay away from Snuza. They just want to sell you a unit. They don’t care if it works.
customer_reviews.author: Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: False Alarms Galore
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had the box to return this. I’m so disappointed, we get SEVERAL false alarms a night, to the point where we’ve stopped using it. I have more peace of mind without it. Pretty sure I ripped a C section stitch flying out of bed to check on her so many times. Thanks Snuza.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: boys soak Pj’s in pee every time due to gap in front of diaper from snuza placement.
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited to use this product but once we read the instructions, we had to wait to even use it until his umbilical cord stump fell off (so 3 weeks) which was a huge bummer because as first time parents, we were super paranoid of SIDS. Once the stump fell off, we were excited to FINALLY try this out, but every time we put it on him, it caused him to pee out of his diaper (up the front, because that’s where the snuza hooks onto is the front of the diaper, and he would soak his pj’s. We ended up going through multiple outfits a night. I would recommend maybe looking into the Owlet.
customer_reviews.author: RC Buschman

customer_reviews.title: Finally, some peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: I am a medical professional and realize that SIDS can be prevented largely with good sleep environments and preventative measures but I’m also a first time mom and nothing puts your mind to rest like something tangible that’s watching after your baby. I used to just worry and go into the baby’s room to make sure he was breathing or I’d watch the baby monitor excessively but this helped to give me some peace of mind when I just couldn’t sleep because I was worried about him.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my second child and I wish I would have spent the money and bought it for my first to use too. It gave me so much peace of mind with the reassuring beep. We do have a false alarm about once a week but our kiddo is super wiggly and has worked it off her diaper. I like how the monitor showed you too if it’s done any rousing alarms. She is currently 3 months old and caught the cold the entire family had. The only thing allowing us to sleep is knowing this will let us know if she begins to have breathing issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Our daughter would not sleep with this in her diaper ...
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter would not sleep with this in her diaper. We tried 2 times with no success. It is bigger than we expected. Sadly we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: JHW-California

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First off, great service from buyer!! 2. I bought this as a gift for my sister who is having her first child. I used it on 2 out of 3 of my kids (didnt know about it for the first) it is the greatest thing ever!!!! It works great, it is mobile unlike the angel care, and gives you great pc of mind and allows you to sleep knowing you will be alarmed if your child stops breathing. When they get older, and roll around more it will fall off once in awhile but at least you know it works!!!! I have also given these as gifts to my friends who have had premature babies. Love love love this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Vacura

customer_reviews.title: Buy this and get some rest!
customer_reviews.text: The one product I would buy any first time parents. No more waking up multiple times a night to check for breathing. We started off without this product and I would wake up 10 times a night worried she wasn't breathing. For piece of mind this was worth it's weight in gold. Granted it does go off if positioned incorrectly, so more false alarms than anything. Once you get the hang of it false alarms are rare, but the point is peace of mind. One of my best purchases ever, if you don't know what to get for a shower gift look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: Able to sleep. Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say how much I love this thing. It keeps me sane because I can actually sleep. We didn’t have it in the hospital and I don’t think I slept at all. I just stared at my baby all night. I love that the light is just bright enough for me to see blinking on the ceiling so I can lay in any position and still look up and have piece of mind that she’s breathing! It’s super light and portable and the battery lasts a super long time. I just wish you could clip it onto the outside of a onsie or sleep sack.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Willis

customer_reviews.title: 10 months, peace of mind but maybe more headache now
customer_reviews.text: Have been using 10 months now. It’s super easy to use ana figure out the different modes. Has brough emended peace of mind. However; after the baby started filling over we started getting several false alarms. Sometimes 3 a night. The alarm starts to go off, we rush in and he is asleep on his tummy breathing just fine. Now after this going on for a while it is waking our son at night and us as well, leaving us all tired. May have to look for something else. Going to try and change the battery first.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I have used mine on both of my babies. One is now 2 years old and my 12 week old wears it at night. I have never had to replace the battery. I was never sleeping because I was constantly checking them to see if they were breathing in fear of SIDS. This was perfect for me. I test it once a week. I have never had a false alarm. It's perfect for mommies who need a good rest but have hard time relaxing. This takes the stress out of sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Leeleeinjax

customer_reviews.title: Saved our babys life
customer_reviews.text: This monitor saved our babies life. 5 months old our baby stopped breathing my husband & I are both in the medical field. Without this monitor our baby would not be alive. We cannot recommend or thank this company enough. So simple affordable and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product & bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: I got a defective product that kept giving false alarms from day 1. I watched plenty of videos of how to use it and even watched my baby sleeping during the day to try to figure out if the Snuza was somehow moving, but it gave false alarms even when it was in place. Seller won’t let me exchange it since it was already used (how else would I know it’s not working?) If you really want it I suggest getting it at Target or some other place where you can return it if it doesn’t work for you either.
customer_reviews.author: Lenette88

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful peace of mind!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor allows us to sleep! We put these on our twin girls and it is so nice to know their breathing (movement) is being monitored. After starting out life in the NICU and having all kinds of monitors, it was terrifying not having anything checking their breathing when we brought them home. These are wonderful. They do occasionally go off if the baby shifts and creates a gap- or the diaper is not close-fitting enough but for me that is just proof they work well! The battery life is amazing. We have used them over 6 months and still haven't needed to change it. I don't know how I would sleep at night without this monitor. Thanks Snuza!
customer_reviews.author: Sparksnsmoke

customer_reviews.title: Knowing how to use it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I’m able to sleep and not worry about my son not breathing. I’ve noticed others reviews about false alarms and wanted to address that. If my sons isn’t on properly the alarm will sound. You have to have it on correctly . I found peace of mind knowing that the alarm does in fact work if there is no breathing detected. Never had an issue with battery either. Light will turn yellow if battery is not working. Mine is always green hope this helps!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, but needs to be louder
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this more than I like the item itself. Half the time I would forget to put it on until I had already swaddled my little guy and laid him down. Also, it's not very loud, especially once you've got all the blanket layers from the swaddle. I also have a noise maker going on in his room since he has a noisy older sister which muffles out the sound as well. One night I woke up to my baby crying and didn't hear the monitor going off until I was all the way in the room. I sleep right across the hall and couldn't hear it at all.
customer_reviews.author: ap

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old recently had a bad bout of croup and this monitor alerted me 4 times through the night that he wasn't breathing and I was able to stimulate him to breathe. As long as it is securely fastened to the diaper it does not falsely alarm. I have so much comfort knowing I have this on him.
customer_reviews.author: A. N. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great for peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: When my preemie came home from the NICU I had a lot of anxiety without all the machines monitoring her. After reading reviews of different products I settled on this one. I really like this product, it gives me peace of mind and allows me to sleep knowing she's being monitored. In the 3 months we've had it, it's gone off twice, but it was just because it wasn't on the diaper correctly. At least I know it works, it will wake you up if it doesn't detect breathing!
customer_reviews.author: Kcox

customer_reviews.title: Good for some
customer_reviews.text: I loved the monitor, it gave me peice of mind, my daughter bed shared, and worked 99% of the time, the other 1% was it coming loose and going off. She was a back sleeper,until i moved her to her own crib at 9 months, ever since then we have had it go off so many times during the night from coming loose and half the time we couldnt hear it because she was sleeping face down, so much so we had to quit useing it, now im a mess, i wish it stayed in place, or moved with baby better.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Affordable piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: Can't put a price on piece of mind and in this case it's actually affordable. Nothing is ever 100% sure bet, I know that but this is about as close as you can get. So easy to use, easy to attach.l, doesn't disrupt my baby's sleep and if anything we all sleep better because I'm not constantly checking to see if he is breathing. With this I just check for the green light and fall right back to sleep. I use this with a fleece sleeping sack and I can still see the light. So awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Ash'Marie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed & Awake at 2am - 2 False Alarms
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 3 to 4 stars had it not been the 3rd time this week I've had 2 false alarms in the same night. It pretty good at first...It's all about getting the diaper folded well & it staying put. My little ones typically rolls to her stomach pretty quickly so we've been trying to put this on her side & it's not working well. I even have a pair of sleep pants holding it in place & it's still gone off twice. I'm very disappointed. It has helped me with piece of mind but I'm starting to wonder if all the false alarms make this necessary...
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kube

customer_reviews.title: this is an amazing product that gives you some peace of mind with ...
customer_reviews.text: While I did return this because my sister in law gave us the exact same thing, it wasn't because of any problems. this is an amazing product that gives you some peace of mind with a new baby. My wife seriously will not sleep if my daughter doesn't have her snooza on. It rarely has false alarms, and that also makes me have more faith in it. The battery still hasn't died after 9 months of use. I can't say enough good about this thing. Thank God our Daughter hasn't stopped breathing, but if she did I think this could possibly save her life.
customer_reviews.author: 1234rc

customer_reviews.title: I love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. My baby came home from the NICU with an apnea monitor from the hospital. The apnea monitor was costing about $300.00 a month so when the doctors discontinued its use we switched to this monitor for our peace of mind. I have nothing but praise. It has alarmed when our baby stopped breathing. we have been using it for 5 months now and have had to change the battery 2x. We only put it on our little guy during the night hours and it has never fallen off. it is very snug on his diaper. he is now rolling around all over his crib and it still stays on tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Britton

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work well for us.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a clever idea, but we had a hard time positioning this so it would accurately pick up my son's breathing. It was annoying to have it go off when everything was fine and difficult to turn off since it was under his clothes. We ended up returning it. My baby was pretty skinny, so that might have been part of the issue. It might work better on a chunkier baby.
customer_reviews.author: caj57

customer_reviews.title: No false alarms!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! We used something else before that wasn't good and kept going off. The Snuza is amazing, the sensor is very sensitive what helps with no false alarms. At first I didn't like the idea of putting it on my baby's diaper, directly on his skin, so I hang it on top of his cloths on his pants and it still works great! Very happy with it. Highly recomended!
customer_reviews.author: Eliran Azouri

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my baby was having seizure like spasms and obviously I was scared she would have one in the middle of the night at stop breathing. This thing is so easy to put on and she doesn’t seem bothered by it at all. I love the little beep sounds you can turn on or off because in the middle of the night I love being able to just wake up a little and hear a beep and I’m able to immediately go back to sleep. I love this thing for the great peace of mind I get.
customer_reviews.author: brittany Ebel

customer_reviews.title: Best baby item ever
customer_reviews.text: This is our third baby and second Snuza. This simple device gives us complete peace of mind that our baby is safe while sleeping. Fantastic product, would 100% recommend to anyone having a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I used this snuza for a year without having to replace the battery. It has lasted through my son, and is currently being used with my niece. It is definitely worth the price. For those of you hesitant, the snuza gives you peace of mind. It is worth the money because you cannot put a price tag on your child's life! My main recommendation is to clip it to the pants, not the diaper. The pants give it a better grip that way it doesn't easily slide off and give a false alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to return this as the reason I brought it was for our road trip. I found out after reading the instructions it’s not compatible with car rides. Which makes sense when I thought about it. My daughter ended up getting RSV when she was 3 months old and I was terrified about her breathing. This monitor made me feel better when she was wearing it when I would go to sleep. It is super easy to use. It is like having a set of eyes on your baby when you can not. Highly recommend getting if you want the comfortable of knowing your baby is safe
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: precious information for a new mother
customer_reviews.text: anxiety about sleeping through an event that my baby might have led me to products that alert you to breathing problems....my sister used this same product Snuza and found great comfort in knowing there would be an alert if breathing changed.....so when my sweet baby arrived I researched and agreed this was convenient and price appropriate for me too....Works well when attached as directed to diaper.
customer_reviews.author: fraiser

customer_reviews.title: Dont recommend
customer_reviews.text: When I got this I was super excited to use it. I immediately pulled it out, read all the info & then put it on baby! Unfortunately it didnt work well. :( the lights would change colors saying there was no movement, but it also did not try to stimulate or alarm. Then I readjusted to make sure it was working properly and it started going off every minute. :( was definitely upset with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Love my snuza!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t comment on battery life since I’ve only been using for 7 weeks but so far haven’t had an issue also no false alarms as well. I have a squirmy baby so sometimes if he squirms too much while I’m feeding him I’ll have to adjust it. I’ve noticed Sometimes when I change him in the morning it will be halfway off but not problems still functions perfect. Also you have to make sure the diaper is quite tight or it will loosen. overall I’m glad I didn’t waste more on other brand. Love the beeping as well I thought I’d hate it but it’s nice to hear while I’m dozing off.
customer_reviews.author: Joltsprite2

customer_reviews.title: Mama Sleep Saver
customer_reviews.text: This is really a device for the mamas and the papas. It is giving me the peace of mind that I can finally sleep. When my little ones makes grunts and noises in the night, I can sit up, see the blinking light from emitting from her pack n play, and go back to sleep without having to get up and shine a light on her to check her breathing. I've only had it go off once in 2 months as a false alarm because her diaper was too lose and the alarm moved when she was sleeping. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Although an app would be a nice feature, the alarm is plenty effective for alerting ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny for piece of mind. So far, it only set off a false alarm after a long stretch of sleep because it had come loose from the diaper. For the most part, the device stays very secure on my little girl and she is quite small (almost 7 lbs). After doing a bunch of research I found out that, unlike the owlet, this product doesn't emit any harmful EMF. This only happens with devices that have wireless connectivity. Although an app would be a nice feature, the alarm is plenty effective for alerting parents if there is cause for concern. I am so glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: JLofthus

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure this just saved my daughters life. All night I kept checking more than I usually do. I just had a weird feeling. Well about an hour later I hear the alarm going off. I've never run so fast in my entire life, my husband was right behind me. I picked her up and start saying her name, she woke up. We actually have the owlet sock, we had way too many issues with it. My only issue with the suza is I worry its not loud enough. If it wasn't for the baby monitor, I'm not sure I would have heard it and we are right next to her room.
customer_reviews.author: chesley

customer_reviews.title: Gives us peace of mind so I can sleep.
customer_reviews.text: The best investment for parents who need some peace of mind. When we first brought my son home I just could not sleep. I was so afraid something would happen to him in the middle of the night. This product lets me sleep easy, knowing my baby is just fine. It's gone off a couple times because it fell off his diaper but that was actually reassuring because I'm 100% certain it would go off if something was actually wrong. Thank you so much for the sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: As a new mom who suffers fro. Post partum anxiety and depression, it felt like my baby was going to be hurt by anything. Everything scared me with him. I couldn't sleep at night, I would lay staring at his chest making sure he was breathing. And then, along comes the Snuza. It has been a life saver. I can deal with the false alarms, it's usually from when the baby wiggles it off the diaper or put of place. It baby doesnt mind it at all. Thank you for this peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Will work if placed on top of one onesie.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my preemie 5weeks early. This will work through a onesie. We put this on his pants and on top of his onsie. Def worked. Heck, we even used it on the blanket he was wrapped in! We just wanted to see how sensitive it is and it worked! It works like it says it will, looks like the picture. And it was small enough for my preemie son 5lbs 20inch
customer_reviews.author: lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a life saver for us! It helps me relax and a piece of mind knowing my baby is wearing this. I've had no false alarms but I did notice that if the diaper isn't on tight enough that it will not track movement properly. I recommend this monitor to any parent who is losing sleep over the fear of SIDS!
customer_reviews.author: Kymm

customer_reviews.title: Gives you a peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: When my fist son was born, the new parents' worst nightmare is finding your newborn not to breathing. I couldn't sleep well and rather watch my son to make sure if he is breathing okay. so we got this and give us peace of mind instantly! We tested before use it on our son and 100% accurate as long as you put it on the diaper securely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind accomplished
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for a month now with our newborn, it’s allowed us to sleep more peacefully without worrying so much about the little one. It’s held it’s charge for a month so far, and we use it every night and in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect and so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I work with newborn babies as a travel/local postpartum doula. This is perfect and so easy to use. It is portable with no wires. It just clips on the front of the baby’s diaper. I have clients that use this over the owlet or those that go under the mattress. I love how or is so convenient and portable but I like mostly that it is effective and accurate. I bought my own to use with clients. I work with a lot of high risk babies. This is peace of mind for me and the parents!
customer_reviews.author: DoulaDebbie

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth for weeks between the snuza and the owlet monitors. In the end I purchased the snuza due to price, reviews and different features (I didn't want an app or the need for wifi), I COULD NOT be happier with my decision! I put baby to bed last night and shed a tear of relief because I could see and hear that she was ok. I will recommend the snuza to EVERYONE I know with or having a baby!
customer_reviews.author: Lora Pinkham

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it makes me feel so much better to know my baby girl is safe throughout the night. The pediatrician said it was going to drive us crazy with false alarms, but it only has a false alarm once in a blue moon. There was once I witnessed it vibrate and beep and my baby girl took a large gasp of breath- it scared me so much to think she may not have been breathing! Less expensive than the owlet, and gives you peace of mind. We did order one that did not work, (it repeatedly beeped) but it was replaced by amazon, no issue.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: So helpful, puts mind at ease!
customer_reviews.text: So far it's working well and gives me piece of mind. It went off once the other day because it had slid to the side of his diaper, but as long as you make sure it's really secured and upright, it will stay put! Baby doesn't seem to be bothered by it. Truly gives you a good feeling to lay your baby down for a rest without feeling neurotic or worried. Glad it's a quality product that is priced well and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Coz Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this product for 3 months and we love it. I bought the snuza because my little man had a few breathing spells in the hospital and I was just scared. I have only had 2 false alarms and that was because it slipped off the diaper. It has done the warning beep and vibration once for my baby and that truly was because he wasn't breathing for the 15 sec. Once it vibrated he took a breath. I am loving the feature that beeps with every breath, that way I can hear that he is breathing without turning a light on it getting out of bed. This product has made it easier for me to relax.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Gold

customer_reviews.title: I get peaceful sleep!
customer_reviews.text: Great for peace of mind. We used the Snuza as soon as we brought baby home. It was quite awkward with the umbilical cord but once it fell off, no problem. In regards to false alarms, this happens when the sensor doesn't have a good connection to baby belly, it's happened maybe three times in two months. I'd rather have a false alarm than no alarm! Batteries last about a month and a half using Snuza only at night, so it's good to stock up!
customer_reviews.author: Sara D

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product easy to use. My son likes to sleep in his stroller in the day time so this is perfect as it’s has no cords or pad. It’s very small and clips on tight so it can’t slide off I even just attach it to his pants and not the diaper some times. We have another device with the pad and it’s just painful when you go on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Davey

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely loved the peace of mind it gave me
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd son had an ALTE and stopped breathing as an infant. I was scared to ever fall asleep after that and would constantly check on him. A friend suggested this when I voiced concerns about my new baby. I absolutely loved the peace of mind it gave me. We had a couple false alarms but honestly I am ok with that. I slept so much better knowing we had something extra looking out for her.
customer_reviews.author: L. K.

customer_reviews.title: As described. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of mind. Alarm is loud enough to be heard through monitor. Only 2 false alarms in 120 nights of wearing it. Stopped using it ones baby rolled over in sleep. Highly recommend. I know it’s not a necessity but for the price and the piece of mind it gave me, it was well worth it. Had a friend lose a kid from SIDS and this device would have most likely prevented that. Money well spent because I’d never forgive myself if I didn’t push buy and something did happen.
customer_reviews.author: Pete S.

customer_reviews.title: Sent a used product
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed. I paid full price for a brand new Snuza and received a used product. The battery is dead, there is built up yellow gunk around the sensor tip and there is a chunk missing out of the purple tip.
customer_reviews.author: Very Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is worth 4.5 stars in my opinion, the only con is its not the easiest thing to slide onto a diaper in the middle of the night during a change. Luckily my 5 week old son has not stopped breathing in order for this to alert us, however I've left it on the changing pad during a change and the alarm did sound off. It's fairly loud, if you're a super heavy sleeper you might miss it but in that case you'd probably miss any alarm. It gives us a little piece of mind and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: G&K

customer_reviews.title: Small and effective!
customer_reviews.text: These things are great! I got two for my preemie twins and they provide such a peace of mind for me. They are smaller than I expected, coming in at the length of my thumb! They're a little difficult to slide onto the boys' diapers, but stay snugly on once placed. These were affordable compared to other monitors on the market and I am so pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zlo3d2

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Had the Owlet sock and got multiple false alarms regarding O2. After being assured by our pediatrician that our baby was fine, I researched alternative monitors and am SO happy with the Snuza. It monitors what we want it to monitor without all the added frou-frou. Works good over babies pants as well 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wischkaemper

customer_reviews.title: Undecided about this
customer_reviews.text: It sometimes goes off as not registering breathing even when I’m watching him breathe. Thankfully it’s not done it while I’m sleeping so it hasn’t caused a panic (yet). It’s also really hard to turn off. Overall though I’m glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: We were happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: We were happy with this product! One time it sounded the alarm and my daughter was not breathing, whether she was holding her breath or something else horrible could’ve happened, I immediately jumped up and picked her up and that startled her awake. Only reason I’m not giving this a 5, there were several times that it slid around on her diaper and then sounded an alarm because it wasn’t up against her.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Eddins

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: Since my original review was taken down for being a little too informative, I’ll just say that this product is NOT worth the money and their customer service is awful.
customer_reviews.author: MorgansMom7348

customer_reviews.title: I can sleep at night!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a NICU nurse and a result, I am one paranoid parent!!! I would have a hospital monitor in my child's room if it were an option. But this was the next best thing. It gave me the peace of mind to sleep a little better at night. In fact, the one time it alarmed was after about 6 weeks of using it. It ended up that it shifted off the diaper a bit and wasn't picking up her breaths. I think it's a little expensive, but I would buy it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Onarom

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for parents! My daughter kept forgetting to breathe and i was terrifies something bad would happen. With this it gave me a peace of mind. Its already saved my little girl 5 times. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: tabitha E.

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind for a good night sleep!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best sleep I ever had while I was going through the first days of having a newborn in the house! We kept it on our baby every night until he got past the time of greatest risk for SIDS. My first days home with the baby, I could not sleep if he was crying, but then when he fell asleep I could not sleep because he was too quiet. This device gave me the piece of mind to sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Schrock

customer_reviews.title: Awesome - for 2 nights
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product for the first two nights of use. It was very reassuring to see the little green light blinking. Mine worked for two days, early on night 3 the battery gave out. The description reads the battery will last 2000 hours. I contacted the company, who simply directed me to purchase another battery rather than provide any remedy for sending me a defective one. Very annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa May

customer_reviews.title: Worth.  Every.  Penny.
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastically - only one false alarm so far (kid pulled it off - rolling around). Definitely worth it for the peace of mind. Battery seems to last forever. Intuitive and easy to use - even for the sleep-deprived. Doesn't seem to bother and works no matter how much they move around. Word to the wise - find out as soon as you get it which battery you need and order an extra.
customer_reviews.author: snndn

customer_reviews.title: Worst Product Support
customer_reviews.text: Horrible Product support. The Snuza stopped working after 3 month. There is no support - a telephone number no one ever picks up and an email no on answers.
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING FOR NEW PARENTS
customer_reviews.text: It took me a LONG time to decide what’s monitor I was going to get before our daughter was born, we decided on this one and I’m SO glad we did. It’s so easy to use, put on, turn off and it gives us a peace of mind so we can actually sleep when she does. The battery life has lasted us 2 months using every night so far, and it’s really nice because we know it’s working regardless of wifi or Bluetooth like some other monitors do! We love the snuza!! I recommend it to all my expectant friends! :)
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Worth the peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: So far it has been worth the peace of mind. My perfectly healthy baby had an incident and it terrified me to think of what could have happened if my alarm had been set for just a few minutes later. I really couldn't afford to buy this but I couldn't afford not to the price is a bit steep but after a scare it's more than with it. Don't wait until you have the same experience I did get it before baby comes. I have been telling everyone I know about this thing!
customer_reviews.author: I Bought It

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well. We got for our tummy sleeper just ...
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. We got for our tummy sleeper just as added security. It still needs to be clipped to the front of the diaper even when tummy-sleeping. We did have a few false alarms, but overall worked well. She's now sleeping on her back and I don't use it anymore, but I felt safer knowing that she was fine while she was wearing the monitor. Also liked that this was portable and could be used where she was napping (rather than the under crib monitors).
customer_reviews.author: Alison Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: When looking up online to see if these prevent SIDS... It is debatable if they actually work... However I'm the type of mother who will jostle the baby a little bit to make sure they are still breathing. This will wake up the baby causing many restless nights. The snuza fixes all that! Now, I just look over and see the green light blinking. It had given me so much peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for peace of mind for my newborn (now 2 months old). We use it every night and I don’t feel like I need to check on her constantly. The alarm has gone off a few times and scared me. It has just slipped off her diaper. I would rather have a few false alarms and peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: I gladly paid a hundred bucks so that I could go to sleep
customer_reviews.text: I have now used this device with two babies, and it gave me so much peace of mind. Yes, it does have false alarms, but it was almost always because I had either placed it incorrectly or the baby was wiggling a whole lot. I think that this device allowed me to go to sleep during the first few months that I wouldn't have been able to otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: SWM

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay put!
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to work just fine...if it stays in place. We fold the diaper over every night, and it still falls off every night, thus leading to false alarms. Maybe there's a trick to getting it to stay, but we sure haven't figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: The Switzers

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these monitors for my twins and I love the peace of mind that it gives me. It is easy to use, you just stick it on the front of the diaper, turn it on, and let it do its thing. The babies don't seem to even notice it's there. I have not had any false alarms which was one of my concerns, but I'd rather have a false alarm than no alarm. I would recommend this to any new parent, especially if your children are at higher risk for SIDS due to prematurity or low birth weight as mine are.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't sleep without it!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter stopped breathing when she was a week old. When we can home from that hospital trip we knew we had to get something to monitor her breathing or we'd never sleep. After doing extensive research we decided to go with this product and absolutely love it!! It's small, un-intrusive, and very easy to use. We have never had a false alarm and thankfully never had a real alarm but the peace of mind is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: As a first time mom this eased my worries. Motion detection is good. If I recall right it only went off once or twice I ran and checked but baby was fine. I definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Locarno

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after a girl in my mom's group lost her 8 week old to SIDS and after another woman in that group would've lost her baby if it hadn't have been for the Snuza. We've used it for about a week now, and it has eased some of my anxiety. We had one false alarm when the Snuza slipped off of my baby's diaper. The alarm that went off on the Snuza was loud enough to rouse my husband out of his sleep, and he can usually sleep through anything. The vibration is definitely strong, but not enough to hurt the baby. I love my Snuza and don't regret getting it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Heather C.

customer_reviews.title: ... weeks old) just over a week ago and we love it! She has been turning to her side ...
customer_reviews.text: We got our Snuza for my daughter (nearly 6 weeks old) just over a week ago and we love it! She has been turning to her side since she was a week old and this monitor has given us such peace of mind during the night. We also anticipated having the occasional false alarm since she is such a wiggle worm but haven't had one so far (folding the top of the diaper down before clipping on does help keep the monitor secure), and she seems totally comfortable when it is hooked to her diaper. I also love the indicator light and optional beeping per breath feature. Would definitely recommend to fellow parents!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Rail

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT NOW. You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.text: My anxiety was keeping me awake at night, constantly checking on my sound asleep baby. I haven’t had any false alarms with this product and it is comfortable for her to wear. I love looking over and seeing the green light flash with every breath she takes. It was SO WORTH every penny. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Brazier

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: Not ideal, our daughter sleeps in a onsie so putting this on her means having to lay her down and undressing her to attach it. Well she usually falls asleep on us so that would mean waking her up first. If I think ahead and put it in her before she falls asleep and hold her to rock her to sleep then this digs into her belly
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Only reason I could sleep
customer_reviews.text: My baby has GERD and used to get choked on her spit up so much. Plus she has a seizure so this product is the only reason I was able to sleep. She is currently six months old and I still use it until her GERD starts going away
customer_reviews.author: Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Best baby present I recieved
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. It helps me sleep so much better knowing that it will alarm if my little one stops breathing. I still wake up to check on my baby to make sure he is breathing, but not every 15 minutes like I did before he had this monitor. Definitely worth the investment, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina Bealert

customer_reviews.title: Easy safety check for new baby & anxious parents!
customer_reviews.text: Super useful product for us anxious new moms. Much cheaper than a certain sock that also monitors baby’s well-being. Easy to use. We’ve definitely gotten a few false beeps due to poor positioning, but I’d much rather have it be too sensitive than not sensitive enough. We’ve gotten the hang of it now—you have to point the tip in the right direction otherwise it turns to the side and beeps because it’s not in contact with baby’s skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: So helpful
customer_reviews.text: This was such a huge help for us. We folded my daughter’s diaper over once to make it a snug fit on the diaper and it worked perfect. It gave me such peace of mind. Used it on both daughters and it did alert us to one time my youngest got herself in a bad position in her crib. So glad I had it.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the Snuza Hero for three nights now and I’m sleeping so much better with my newborn knowing that if he stops breathing the Snuza will alert me. Before I wasn’t sleeping at all, I was staring at my son to make sure he was still breathing and I was basically a zombie. Now I’m well rested and can enjoy my days with my baby! So glad I went with this instead of spending $300 on an owlet!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and reliable
customer_reviews.text: This has given me such piece of mind. My almost 7 month old wears it every night. I actually washed his first one so I bought another. The only negative is that it was hard to use the first week because of his umbilical cord but I still used it and it was fine. Get this if you’re anxious and wake up to watch your baby breath.
customer_reviews.author: nicole king

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this device
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase this because most of the reviews are very positive and I could use a little more peace of mind. My baby is 5 weeks and I have been using it for about two weeks. A few nights ago, the alarm went off that she wasn't breathing. I panicked and just ripped her onesie open to try to wake her. I didn't get to check if she was actually breathing or not because I just reacted. In either situation, I recommend this device. It's nice to add a little more precaution with dealing with such a fragile and precious mini human. I still always check on her though.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D.

customer_reviews.title: Great peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the SNUZA as a replacemetn for one we recieved as a gift at our baby shower. We love it!!! I have 4 children and this is the first baby that I have felt comfortable to go to sleep after putting to bed. When we first brought her home we had a few false alarms that woke me up easily. We eliminated the false alarms by placing a wide lace headband around her waist to fit the SNUZA to. It was not a good fit on her diaper, she was very small due to being a preemie. She is now 6 months old and I use it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Powers

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I'm returning this. I wanted to love it but got several false readings in the middle of the night. Trying to take off a swaddled baby was easy when its beeping like crazy
customer_reviews.author: artist

customer_reviews.title: Beeps with breathing
customer_reviews.text: For my premature baby this product has been a piece of mind There is a setting where it will beep every time the baby takes a breath so at night you can get sleep! Make sure that you put it on tighter clothing because of the pants are too loose it will not pick up
customer_reviews.author: James D. Gober

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with this. I lost my first one and re-purchased it. I've never heard the alarm go off but I do get peace of mind seeing the flashing green light when our baby breathes. My husband is a physician and first poked fun at me for buying it but he had since changed his mind. He agrees it's a pretty neat device.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, so glad I bought this, it helps me sleep better at night and actually works. Half asleep, I didn't get it clipped on very well and from my baby's wiggling it fell off. Almost gave my husband and I a heart attack from the alarm going off but good to know it works!
customer_reviews.author: HollyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Loved this.
customer_reviews.text: Every night for the first 6 months this was on my little's diaper. I'd buy it again. Peace of mind has no price. Alarm will rock your new parent world in the middle pf the night, but it is there just for that. Alarm went off both times bc diaper was loose and baby shifted. Loved this.
customer_reviews.author: Karly Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't want to be without it!
customer_reviews.text: My piece of mind! We used Angel Care crib monitors for our first two children, but when our third child was born prematurely and came home with reflux, he often slept in his car seat for elevation. The Snuza Hero allowed us to rest assured that his breathing was being monitored no matter where he was! He is almost 7 months old and we still use it. He sleeps in a cosleeper next to our bed now and I love being able to glance over and see the blinking green light. It does eat through batteries though, so stock up! (Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars)
customer_reviews.author: ChesapeakeBorn

customer_reviews.title: Simple and reassuring
customer_reviews.text: I love the simplicity of the Snuza. When my daughter first started sleeping through the night, I kept waking up every few hours (not intentionally) to check on her. The Snuza gives me enough peace of mind to sleep more soundly. I like the light on it that blinks with each movement so you know it's on. We've had a couple of false alarms, but I think that happens with any sleep monitor, and we're glad to at least know it works!
customer_reviews.author: Justin and Katie H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: 5+ Stars for excellent customer service. I recently purchased this monitor and my battery died not too long ago. I reached out to the company and they were happy to send me a replacement without me asking for it. I love this monitor!! It allows me to sleep at night without worrying if my baby is ok. I would highly recommend purchasing the monitor through this them, it's worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Buy it. Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Purchased just a couple days after baby was born. Wish we would have bought it before he arrived cause it really helped give us peace of mind through the night and through the day! The fact that you can set it to beep every time he breathes/moves was fantastic! It was music to my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: As a first time parent, this device allowed me to sleep without checking on my daughter every 5 minutes. It's small and the clip is very tight, we've rarely had problems with false alarms. Only a couple of times if the diaper is not snug enough has it gone off and she's breathing fine. But overall for the price and peace of mind it's worth it
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this after someone suggested it. It is portable and easy to use compared to some monitors that require the baby to sleep on a sensor. It just clips to the front of the baby's diaper. If you fold over the diaper and attach it securely, it rarely falls off and gives a "false" alarm. It definitely is worth every penny for the peace of mind. I wish I had gotten it from the time my baby was first born...I sleep better knowing the monitor is watching her breathe (which all new moms sit and do). Some folks commented that their battery failed right away. Mine works just fine, but I bought extra batteries just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Kat301

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great. Had issues with it coming off the diaper but then saw that you just need to put some Velcro on the back and it sticks great. The battery that comes with it didn't last long but the ones i ordered have lasted over 4 months. Works well and is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: LeslieA

customer_reviews.title: Did not hear the alarm go off
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if mine is just defective or what, but the alarm is not loud at all. A couple of times it has accidentally fallen off in the middle of the night and we didn't even hear it beep and we were in the same room. The doctor has just discovered a breathing problem with my newborn so I will be looking for another product. My night nurse seems to think this one might just be defective because she's kept other babies that had this and said it was louder. I don't know...
customer_reviews.author: Leslie H.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful, But Will Freak You Out
customer_reviews.text: We only used this for a couple of weeks with our son. We probably should have returned it, but never did just in case. Yes, it does a good job of monitoring for breathing. If your baby moves around a fair amount while sleeping, though, it'll get knocked loose frequently and will cause you to run in and check on them far too often (and you'll have a hard time going back to sleep even after a false scare). I thought this would make us sleep easier, but it ended up having the opposite effect. Your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: Piece of mind for us parents. Seems to act weird sometimes. Will randomly be flashing red and doesn't match anything the book says knowing she hasn't had an episode of no movement. Works best with a tight onesie!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: Snuza Hero (SE) Baby Movement Monitor
product_meta.description: Snuza Hero baby monitor is a wearable device which attaches to your baby's diaper and monitors your baby’s abdominal movements. The Hero detects the slightest of movements and will alert you if abdominal movement is weak or less than eight movements per minute. If the Snuza Hero detects no abdominal movement for 15 seconds, it will vibrate in an effort to rouse your baby to resume abdominal movements. Often the vibration is enough to rouse the infant and Hero will revert to monitoring mode. However, after three vibration/rousing incidents, a Rouse Warning will alert you that movement has stopped for 15 seconds on three occasions. If an additional 5 seconds of no abdominal movement is detected a sharp audible alarm will sound.
feature_bullets: Wearable devise, Clips onto Diaper, No cords, wires or sensor pads
Vibration stimulus after 15 seconds of no abdominal movement
Alarms after 20 seconds of no abdominal movement

specifications.Alert type: Movement Indicator Lights, Movement Ticks, Low Battery
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,160 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
